headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.gstatic.com https://firebase.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; img-src 'self' data: https: https://*.firebaseapp.com https://*.firebasestorage.googleapis.com https://*.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.firebaseio.com https://*.firebaseapp.com https://*.googleapis.com https://*.gstatic.com https://*.vercel.app https://*.cloudfunctions.net; font-src 'self' data: https://*.gstatic.com; frame-ancestors 'none';
